name: Project Coldblood
description:
This prototype was developed for Projecto I and II by João Gibão and Nuno Batista.

Music by Healer.

Controls (Keyboard/Controller):

A / Left Analog – Run left; 

D / Left Analog – Run right; 

Space / A – Jump; 

Middle Mouse / Right Trigger – Grab wall; 

W / Left Analog - Climb wall (Hold Middle Mouse and W); 

S / Left Analog - Crouch / Slide wall; 

Shift / Right Bumper – Dash; 

Left Mouse / X – Melee attack; 

Right Mouse / Y – Ranged attack; 

C / B - Area of Effect attack; 

R – Respawn; 

P – Pause; 

M – Mute/Unmute music; 

Escape – Main menu;
